Export.Routine:
WWW0131B ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; Change User's Current Location ; ; Inputs : ; ; ByRef : ; YINHALT = Company (Deprecated - always 0) ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 18.11.2004 FIS 25984: LÃ–SCHEN VOR NEUAUFBAU ; 09.08.2001 DT Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new YLFNX,YI
; FIXME : Only overwrites/provides first 40 locations for list?
set YFELD = $get(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$horolog,YUSER,YFORM,YART,1)) ;data record set %TXT(1)=""
if YINHALT="" do quit ; EARLY EXIT ; FIXME : Remove this block and replace YINHALT with 0 below? . for YI=1:1:40 do . . set %TXT(1) = %TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_YART_(YLFN+1)_"~"_YI_"~"_" "_"~"_YI
do . set %TXT(1) = %TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_YART_(YLFN+1)_"~REMOVE" ; Clear before reconstruction . set %TXT(1) = %TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_YART_(YLFN+1)_"~"_""_"~"_" "_"~"_0 . set YLFNX = "" . for YI=1:1:40 set YLFNX = $order(^WWW0121(0,YINHALT,YLFNX)) quit:YLFNX="" do . . set %TXT(1) = %TXT(1)_"#Y"_YFORM_YART_(YLFN+1)_"~"_YLFNX_"~"_YLFNX_" - "_$piece($get(^WWW0121(0,YINHALT,YLFNX,1)),Y,1)_"~"_YI
quit
